name: Lakefront Estates
about: Lakefront Estates is a real estate platform. it offers seamless filtering options, empowering users to search for properties tailored to their preferences. The website also provide  email system, enabling users to communicate directly with property owners for queries or appointment requests.Admin can manage all the user and others schedules and home properties

name: Faria's Cooking Luxury
about: Farias Cooking Luxury is a service review platform where users can login via Google account or create an account directly on the website. Here, users can add, update, and delete recipes and services they offer, along with leaving reviews that can be managed at their discretion.

name: Beats To Read
about: This is a FUll-stack Book Reselling website with three different user role(Admin,Seller,Buyer).User can Buy Books only from verified seller (developed using ReactJS).User can pay through Master Card, visa Card etc.(developed using StripeJS).Admin can Delete, Verify any Seller or buyer.
